summary:
- **Buy-back Type**: On-market buy-back  
- **Total Buy-back Program**: Up to $400 million AUD worth of ordinary shares  
- **Buy-back Window**: 28/3/2025 to 27/3/2026  
- **Cumulative Shares Repurchased**: 10,012,644 (before 29/7/2025) + 65,231 (on 29/7/2025)  
- **Cumulative Spend**: AUD 191,302,483.57 (before 29/7/2025) + AUD 1,392,231.76 (on 29/7/2025)  
- **Price Range**: AUD 16.95 (low) to AUD 21.52 (high)  
- **Broker**: Goldman Sachs Australia Pty Ltd  
- **Flexibility**: Amount/timing subject to market conditions; buy-back may be varied/suspended/terminated.  

*No material valuation or capital structure impacts beyond ongoing buy-back execution.*
